greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle read by rows: row n gives coefficients of expansion of Product_{k=2..n} ((n+1-k)*x+k), starting with lowest power.
comment: Related to Stirling numbers A008275, A008277.
link: Alois P. Heinz, Rows n = 0..141, flattened
Jean-Christophe Novelli and Jean-Yves Thibon, Duplicial algebras and Lagrange inversion, arXiv preprint arXiv:1209.5959 [math.CO], 2012-2013.
maple: T:= n-> (p-> seq(coeff(p, x, i), i=0..degree(p)))(
mathematica: row[n_] := CoefficientList[Product[((n+1-k)*x+k), {k, 2, n}], x]; Table[ row[n], {n, 0, 10}] // Flatten (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Feb 17 2016 *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 29 2012
ext: T(0,0)=1 prepended by _Alois P. Heinz_, Nov 29 2015
